about_the_game:
As a freshly graduated MBA, your life's ambition is to make your mark in the business world.
...But it's the year 3070, the world is gone, humans have colonised space, and we do deals with aliens now.

Welcome to Galacticorp, an intergalactic trade network where money is the lifeblood of all things.
Spend your hard-earned cash to increase your status, allowing you to unlock upgrades, research new technology, travel to unexplored areas and meet new characters.

Features:

Trade
Take advantage of Galacticorp's player-driven marketplace to increase your wealth and expand your company.
Buy and sell items, enhance equipment, hoard rare artifacts. The choice is yours.
Use historic market data to your advantage and try to identify trends before they happen.

Craft
Hire manufacturers to create rare and powerful items for you to increase your efficiency, or play the manufacturer yourself to earn your fortune.
Enhance equippable items for personal improvement, or auction them off on the market.

Progress
Fame comes at a cost. Buy your way to the next level and start over with new, faster ways to progress.
Gain the upper hand, unlocking permanent upgrades that carry across your prestige resets so you never truly start from square one, with separate progression paths for each class.

Travel
Visit unique locations and collect rare items, or sell them on the market for a small fortune.
Befriend NPCs and earn their trust for special progression bonuses.

Compete
Compare yourself against your peers on the leaderboards to win prizes, or maybe just for the fame.

Multiplayer
Join forces with friends, or tactically recruit your rivals, to take on high power NPCs in unique raids.
Create a group to share progression bonuses and raid passes, or play solo to leave your competition in the dust.

Gameplay
Whether you prefer an active or idle play style there are mechanics to suit both, including offline progress, passive bonuses, active skills, minigames, dungeons and more.

Quests
Progress through the optional story quests, learning more about each NPC and the Galacticorp world.
